Achievements.DRYYA_ACH_DESC: Defeat Dryya in her Queen's Garden.
Achievements.HEG_ACH_DESC: Defeat Hegemol in the bustling City.
Achievements.ZEM_ACH_DESC: Defeat Ze'mer in her secret Mansion.
Achievements.PANTH_ACH_DESC: Challenge the Pale Court and win your place at its heart.

CP3.ISMA_LOCKED_DESC: I lie in a lush grove, defended by my beloved
CP3.DRY_LOCKED_DESC: I defend true royalty from the claws of traitors
CP3.ZEM_LOCKED_DESC: You probably already know and despise me for my side quest
CP3.HEG_LOCKED_DESC: I stand guard at the gates of the capital

Minor NPC.SHEO_PC_1: Hello you little piece of shit.
Minor NPC.SHEO_PC_2: The toast on an age ago's bread has dried by now.
Minor NPC.SHEO_PC_3: You should make sure it doesn't get moldy.
Minor NPC.SMITH_PC_2: The bread may be moldy by now however.

Speech.ISMA_DESC: Gentle god of moss and grove.
Speech.DD_ISMA_DESC: Loyal defender gods of land and beast.
Speech.DRY_DESC: Protective god of Root and King.
Speech.ZEM2_DESC: Strange god of a sacred land.

Enemy Dreams.ZEM_DREAM_1: Shoutout to 56 (can't remove this can you)
Enemy Dreams.ZEM_DREAM_2: Similar to her normal dream nail dialogue
Enemy Dreams.DRYYA_DIALOG_2_1: Allow none to enter the glade...
Enemy Dreams.FALSE_KNIGHT_D_2: Show me what you're made of!
Enemy Dreams.FALSE_KNIGHT_D_3: Prove to me you're a champion!
Enemy Dreams.FALSE_KNIGHT_D_3_Unused: Prove to me you're a champion!

UI.CHARM_DESC_PURITY:
The Vessel was gifted a Pure Nail forged through arcane means as a reflection of itself. This Charm embodies the echoes of that ancient forgotten craftsmanship.

Gradually increases the bearer's rate of attack as they land nail strikes in quick succession.
UI.CHARM_DESC_LAMENT:
Contains the hardships and grievances forced upon the chained Vessel. Energy desperately seeps out from within the constraints.

When focusing SOUL, unleash a devastating blast of energy.
UI.CHARM_DESC_BOON:
The Pale Wyrm's beacon shines brightly through this Charm. The blessings and power bestowed upon the land known as Hallownest was able to elevate the lesser bugs that resided in the domain.

Transforms all spells causing them to take on a purified form.
UI.CHARM_DESC_BLOOM:
A pale blossom that was cursed to restrain an uncontrollable power. Even though the darkness within may be repressed, it writhes in a volatile manner threatening to break free.

The bearer grows stronger as they draw nearer to death, sacrificing soul and the protection of masks for overwhelming power.
UI.CHARM_DESC_HONOUR:
Unique charm bestowed by the King to his most loyal knight. Refurbished and restored to its ultimate state.

Surrounds the bearer in a royal aura.

Journal.ENTRY_ISMA_DESC: Champion from a brighter age. Had an affinity for plant life and all things living, but when the kingdom crumbled, she retreated to her Grove, where she perished.
Journal.ENTRY_ISMA_NOTE:
Ah, Isma... where do I begin? Such a kindly figure she is. She cares for everyone, and even in battle, I would sense some sorrow when we would prevail. While my oath forbids it, I must pay her a visit... someday...
- Ogrim of the Five Knights
Journal.ENTRY_HEG_DESC: Champion from a brighter age. Guarded the entrance to the kingdom's capital, but mysteriously disappeared after an unknown encounter.
Journal.ENTRY_HEG_NOTE:
I can still hear your jolly chortle, Hegemol. For such a towering bug, you were so quiet! But your jokes were simply unrivaled. After all this time, I never got to see your face...what was hiding in your armour, dear friend?
- Ogrim of the Five Knights
Journal.ENTRY_DRY_DESC: Champion from a brighter age. Fiercely guarded the Queen's retreat, but was eventually overrun by a traitorous tribe.
Journal.ENTRY_DRY_NOTE:
What a ferocious combatant Dryya was! It was almost like watching an elegant dance when she confronted the kingdom's foes. While she put on a hard front, I'm thankful I was able to witness her soft side.
- Ogrim of the Five Knights
Journal.ENTRY_ZEM_DESC: Champion from a brighter age. Served the kingdom at its height, but retreated to her mansion when it fell to ruin.
Journal.ENTRY_ZEM_NOTE:
Ze'mer... what a fascinating ally you were. Your stories that so enraptured us were quite incredible. Perhaps, you would take me to see your home one day? I would like that very much. To see the world beyond.
- Ogrim of the Five Knights

Reward Room.RR_DRYYA_FIRST_1_1: Oh, it's just you. You're free to enter this area.
Reward Room.RR_DRYYA_FIRST_1_2: I've been standing guard since we received news of this...infection. It is difficult to defend against a peril that can be neither seen nor felt, but we knights must do what we can to defend this kingdom.
Reward Room.RR_DRYYA_FIRST_1_3: After all, afflicted bugs will attack others without restraint, even those they are familiar with; many do not have the strength to turn their nail against those they were once dear to.
Reward Room.RR_DRYYA_FIRST_1_4: It's nothing for you to worry about, though. Our King tells us you possess a special emptiness inside your shell that is immune to its effects.
Reward Room.RR_DRYYA_FIRST_2_1: Your combative skills are truly excellent. I haven't felt so exhilarated in a nailfight for quite some time.
Reward Room.RR_DRYYA_FIRST_2_2: I daresay this is what our King seeks in having us spar, hmm? I'm improving at nailplay more than ever before, and I'm sure the same goes for you.
Reward Room.RR_DRYYA_FIRST_2_3: Perhaps you'll surpass all of us, one day. Or maybe you already have?
Reward Room.RR_DRYYA_FIRST_REPEAT: I must focus on my duties now. Perhaps we may speak another time.
Reward Room.RR_DRYYA_SECOND_1_1: I've been contemplating; your small stature affords you incredible speed and mobility. Besides myself, none of us Knights have a particular focus on such aspects of combat. But even then, I can't seem to land a decisive strike on you much of the time.
Reward Room.RR_DRYYA_SECOND_1_2: Despite your size, you possess strength rivaling that of even myself or Ze'mer. It must certainly be advantageous for you to be so little in battle, then. Hegemol always boasts about his size and strength, but I think his bulk frequently leaves him vulnerable. Don't tell him I ever said that, though.
Reward Room.RR_DRYYA_SECOND_1_3: I wonder, what will happen when you grow larger? Perhaps Ze'mer could teach you how she moves so quickly, despite her stature. None of us other Knights could ever properly learn it, but you seem different. It'd be a shame if you were to lose your mobility with age... it's one of your greatest strengths in combat, from what I've seen from you.
Reward Room.RR_DRYYA_SECOND_2_1: Sharpening the nail is an art, you know. If you've ever any need to polish that weapon of yours a bit, I'll gladly help.
Reward Room.RR_DRYYA_SECOND_2_2: It seems both your nail and mine were forged from a Pale Ore. I know not of the origin of yours, but mine I happened to find in the Crown of the kingdom, where few ever venture.
Reward Room.RR_DRYYA_SECOND_2_2_ALT: It seems both your nail and mine were forged from a Pale Ore. I know not of the origin of yours, but mine I happened to find in the Crown of the kingdom, where few ever venture.
Reward Room.RR_DRYYA_SECOND_2_3: I'm grateful that I was so easily able to obtain an ore that most Nailsmiths squabble over. There had been more embedded in the stone of the peak, but I left it for another traveler to find.
Reward Room.RR_DRYYA_SECOND_2_3_ALT: I'm grateful that I was so easily able to obtain an ore that most Nailsmiths squabble over. There had been more embedded in the stone of the peak, so perhaps it would be of use for your old blade.
Reward Room.RR_DRYYA_SECOND_REPEAT: I'll remain on guard for now, then. I'm sure the others have much to say to you.
Reward Room.RR_DRYYA_THIRD_1_1: Seems I've truly met my match in a nailfight. My offer to sharpen your nail may not even be necessary, should you continue handling it with such dexterity.
Reward Room.RR_DRYYA_THIRD_1_2: I expect I'll see you in the arena soon enough.
Reward Room.RR_DRYYA_THIRD_REPEAT: I expect I'll see you in the arena soon enough.
Reward Room.RR_DRYYA_CHARM_1: I see my charm has been serving you well as of late. Its chains have always disturbed me quite a bit, as if it's barely constraining a powerful force.
Reward Room.RR_DRYYA_CHARM_2: ...No, not necessarily powerful. It feels almost sorrowful, like a voice crying out.
Reward Room.RR_DRYYA_CHARM_3: I've never quite liked using its power because of it, but it seems to resonate with you strangely well. I suppose in the end I'm just its guardian, and the King intended it to be for your use.
Reward Room.RR_DRYYA_OLDNAIL_1: ...Ought I be offended or impressed, that you managed to best me with a nail so worn? Never have I seen an instrument in a state of such disrepair.
Reward Room.RR_DRYYA_OLDNAIL_2: Such a weapon is not befitting one of royal lineage. I will speak to the King about finding you a proper nail; one that doesn't look as though it would shatter to pieces with the next strike.
Reward Room.RR_DRYYA_OLDNAIL_3: In the meantime, though, perhaps I should polish my own skills...
Reward Room.RR_DRYYA_CHEATER: Begone! We don't tolerate cheaters or save editors in these grounds. That, or you're using the placeholder NPC.
Reward Room.RR_OGRIM_CHEATER: Begone! We don't tolerate cheaters or save editors in these grounds. That, or you're using the placeholder NPC.
